headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Limited Time Discounts plus Double GTA$ & RP Opportunities through June 12th
content:
Merchants across Los Santos are giving big, limited time discounts including 25% off the following:

- Yachts
- Executive Offices & Garages
- Imponte Ruiner 2000
- Coil Rocket Voltic
- Rhino Tank
- HVY Insurgent Pick-Up

And get paid handsomely for harnessing the unique powers of all eight Import/Export Special Vehicles - with Double GTA$ & RP in all Special Vehicle Missions through June 12th.

Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
